body.name: Hair Tools Travel Bag and Heat Resistant Mat for Flat Irons, Straighteners, Curling Iron, and Haircare Accessories, 2-in-1 design, with Interior Pockets, Portable Organizer

features: Multipurpose Hair Travel Bag – Offering unique versatility, this 2-in-1 hair tool holder can be used to hold a variety of everyday haircare accessories such as flat irons, curling irons, hair straighteners, curling wands, and other styling tools. Our bag for travel accessories fits styling tools up to 13 inches long and 4 inches wide.

Heat Resistant Interior Mat – Providing essential protection for your hot hair tools, this flat iron holder can be used for setting down accessories while you’re using them to protect counters and storing them even before they cool for personal safety.

Expansive Brand Compatibility – This neoprene flat iron case provides plenty of room for all your hairstyling tools by top brands, including Babyliss Nano Titanium, Chi Flat Iron, Hot Tools Flat Iron, GHD flat iron, Conair Curling Iron, and more.

Versatile Interior Storage Pockets – Our curling iron holder features two interior pockets, one zippered pocket, and two elastic band sections for hair clips to keep all your hair essentials in one place at home or when you’re traveling.

Heavy-Duty Neoprene Pouch – Especially great for avid travelers, this heat-resistant mat and hair straightener holder boasts a magnetic closing and is made with thick, double-layered neoprene that’s soft, durable, and wear-resistant for long-lasting use.
body.description: Store and Protect Hair Tools with a Multipurpose Travel Bag Designed for Modern Hairstyling Accessories There are few days that go by where you aren’t using a flat iron, curling iron, or other hairstyling tools. And if you’re like most people, you set them down on the counter, which can lead to damaged surfaces, or stuff them in a travel bag when you’re on the go, which can damage the devices themselves. That’s why we created a smarter, simpler solution for home, travel, and on-the-go use. The Barefoot Caribou Hair Tools Travel Bag offers true versatility for people who love using hot styling tools and need a better way to keep them protected before, during, and after daily use. Product Details: 2-in-1 Hair Tool Storage Bag Heat-Resistant Padding Heavy-Duty Neoprene Compact, Portable Travel Use Large Carry Capacity Dimensions: 14” x 4” Inner Pad Size: 10” x 13”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good and gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: If you travel a lot or like your things organized, it’s a must have. It’s quite spacious and easily fits a curler, 2 flat irons and a hot comb with more space left over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m really happy with this product. I was using an old cover that came with a prior flat iron to try to fit both my flat iron and curling iron in when I was packing my suitcase. I like how I can fit both of these, plus the cords, and zip it up to neatly pack them away. I wish it was a little bit longer. The bag is 14” long and my curling iron is 16” long, but I managed to get it to fit. I might just need to find a shorter curling iron, because I really like this bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It fits as expected.
reviews.reviewText: It was bulkier than I anticipated but my blow dryer with both attachments fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The roomiest hair tool bag I've ever had!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. At first I was put off by the price. $34 was double what I normally spend on a hair tool bag. However, this bag does double the work. The flap lays down and is large enough for multiple tools and it's heat resistant. The bag has two zippers that go either direction. It has two sections on the inside. There is a clear zipper ouch inside that looks large enough for bobby pins. There are more pouches inside for other hair accessories. I love the color and the functionality. Happy shopping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits and protects my hair appliances!
reviews.reviewText: I fit my blow out brush in here and a mini straightener! It has a good amount of storage space for the both and it is good quality, good for traveling especially because you can use it as a mat to put your hair appliances while doing your hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and Functional
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new heat resistant case/mat for my hair straightener and this one did not disappoint! I have used it multiple times and the case has help up after each use and has not shown any signs of burn marks. It fits both my straightener and curling iron but I do wish the interior pockets were a little larger as my hair clips do not fully fit in them due to being to long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bigger than expected.
reviews.reviewText: This hot tool bag will fit all your hair essentials and it’s really soft so on my recent trip it easily squeezed into my carry on . I always pack hair tools last because I’m using them , so I packed it while my straightener was hot , it protected everything in my bag .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too bulky for optimized packing
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot and this bag seemed like a great option to contain my hair-related equipment. It does the job, but it takes up so much space within my suitcase and, in my opinion, it's not worth the real estate. That being said, if you have the room, it's well made and designed, it provides a great mat to lay out your hot tools and not have to worry about them, and there are all kinds of great little pockets and zippered pouches inside.

I really like this travel case, it has more than enough space to put my claw clips, hair clips, scrunchies and more. It fits two curling irons in nicely, however the pink color I ordered turned out to be more purple than I would've liked, and the material is made of Neoprene which is great for heat resistant however scratches quite easily. Still, it gets the job done and I'm happy with my purchase!
